Test using 30 mL water with 3 mL phenol red
LED placed 2 cm away from chamber and detector 4 cm away
Base reading: 60

Placed scotch tape around red LED to decrease light.
With red LED, at 1.8 V/8 mA, reads 1020
With red LED, at 1.7 V/2 mA, reads 130

Adding another 3 mL of phenol red to increase red absorbance.
Base reading: 40
With red LED, at 1.8V/8 mA, reads 1014
With red LED, at 1.7V/2 mA, reads 120
With blue LED, at 3V/12 mA, reads 123
With blue LED, at 3.1V/17 mA, reads 150
With blue LED, at, 3.2V/24 mA, reads 160

Base reading: 60
With green LED, at 3V/26 mA, reads 200
With green LED, at 3.1V/35 mA, reads 222
With green LED, at 2.9V/21 mA, reads 174

Taking off scotch tape again,
Base reading: 60
With green LED, at 2.9V/19 mA, reads 305
With green LED, at 3V/26 mA, reads 355
With green LED, at 3.1V/34 mA, reads 410

Base reading: 50
With blue LED, at 3.0V/12 mA, reads 155
With blue LED, at 3.1V/17 mA, reads 182
With blue LED, at 3.2V/24 mA, reads 217
With blue LED, at 3.3V/31 mA, reads  256

Same setup but at night
Baseline: 1
Red, 1.8V/9mA: 1020
Blue, 3.2V/27mA: 64
Green, 2.9V/22mA: 145

Adding ~1mL .1% NaOH
Baseline: 1
Green, 2.9V/20mA: 93
Blue, 3.2V/25mA: 58
Red, 1.8V/9mA: 1020




Resistor Values
Red: 510
Green: 1K
Blue: 2K
14 mL sample, 3 drops phenol red
